xml.p: Introduction: "Er... hi. I'm Clint.#$e#I'm the town blacksmith. If you ever need to upgrade your tools, I'm your guy." #!String
Resort_Entering: "I'm gonna put on my special red trunks. They're supposed to be really eye-catching." #!String
Resort_Leaving: "Well, that didn't turn out like I was imagining..." #!String
Resort_Shore: "Oh no... I forgot to clip my toenails.$s" #!String

Resort_Shore_2: "I thought working a furnace would have prepared me for this heat, but I'm sweating in places I didn't know I could.$s#$e#I hope no one noticed...#$e#%Clint's body is glistening..." #!String
Resort_Chair: "Ow... my whole torso is burnt to a crisp.$s" #!String
Resort_Bar: "I'm hungry...$s" #!String
Resort: "*sigh*... We're all at the beach but I still feel so alone...$s" #!String
reject_868: "Hmm... That's an interesting stone, like nothing I've ever seen before.#$b#I wouldn't know what to do with it, though. I deal in the mundane, not the magical..." #!String

cc_Minecart: "Somehow, the old town minecart system started working again. It's very convenient for getting to and from the mines.#$b#Don't get too cozy, though... if it can start up so suddenly, it could just as well shut down..." #!String

Mon: "Yep. I'm a blacksmith.#$e#My father was also a blacksmith.#$e#My grandfather was a blacksmith as well.$u#$q 9/9 Mon_old#I bet you can't guess what my great-grandfather was...#$r 9 30 Mon_9#A blacksmith.#$r 9 50 Mon_clown#A silly clown.#$r 9 -50 Mon_rude#A sarcastic jerk." #!String
Mon_old: "And yes, my great-grandfather was also a blacksmith." #!String
Mon_9: "How'd you know?$u" #!String
Mon_clown: "Hahahaha. Good one.$h" #!String
Mon_rude: "Wow. That was rude. I was just being funny and you took it to a whole new level." #!String
Mon4: "Be glad you're a farmer, @. It's nicer to work outdoors than by a hot furnace all day.#$e#I'm only a blacksmith because my father pushed me into it." #!String
Tue: "If you want me to upgrade your tools you'll have to give me the correct ore.#$e#And you'll have to pay me a fee, of course." #!String
Wed: "Hey. What do you need?" #!String
Wed6: "Oh, hi @. Sorry If I look a little messy. I've been working at the furnace all morning.$h#$e#So, did you need anything, or do you just want to visit?" #!String
Thu: "Business has been slow lately.#$e#You should upgrade your tools. I could use the cash." #!String
Fri: "The weather doesn't really matter to me. I typically stay near my shop year-round.#$e#Depressing, huh?" #!String
Sat: "Sometimes I wonder how I ended up in this town.$u" #!String
Sat6: "Damn it, I'm too old to do anything exciting anymore. All I have to look forward to is years and years of sweaty, hot furnace-work." #!String
Sun: "Don't you have work to do?" #!String
Sun4: "So how are your tools holding up?" #!String
event_advice1: "Okay... I'll keep that in mind." #!String
event_advice2: "That's the problem... I do act natural... but I never have any success.$s" #!String
